item.def:
Power Outlets

There are additional outlets in each guest room on the bedside lamp and two outlets on the media hub for your convenience. There is also a duplex outlet located in the bathroom. Please be advised that when exiting the room that the EVOLVE system will terminate power from all electrical outlets with the exception of your media hub.
item.name: Power Outlets

item.def:
Other Room Amenities

-  Ice bucket, glasses, and a refrigerator are located in the dresser
-  Hairdryers and additional toilet paper are are located in the drawer in the bathroom. If your guest room does not have a drawer in the bathroom these item will be locate in the closet.
-   Spare pillows, blankets, ironing boeard, irons and rebes can be found in the closet.;
-    TV – you can access in room movie and premium as well as local programing.
item.name: Other Room Amenities
